Use this checklist to track workspace setup steps.

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements
- [x] Scaffold the Project
- [x] Customize the Project (Hello World scope; no extra customization needed)
- [x] Install Required Extensions (none required)
- [x] Compile the Project (npm install, npm test)
- [x] Create and Run Task (.vscode/tasks.json created)
- [ ] Launch the Project (start debug after user confirmation)
- [ ] Ensure Documentation is Complete (keep README current)
